section.heading: Continuation of courts; court of record; seal.
section.text: The District of Columbia Court of General Sessions, the Juvenile Court of the District of Columbia, and the District of Columbia Tax Court are consolidated in a single court to be known as the Superior Court of the District of Columbia (hereafter in this title referred to as the “Superior Court”). The Superior Court shall be a court of record in the District of Columbia and shall have a single seal.

annotations.annotation: Continuation of District of Columbia court system, see § 1-207.18.
